channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 23 – Las Vegas
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: :) I guess if I couldn't gamble in Vegas, then gambling is just not for me. At least not right now.
item.content:encoded: :) I guess if I couldn’t gamble in Vegas, then gambling is just not for me. At least not right now.

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: It reminds me my trip. I watched, tasted a little bit of the gembling (lost 50 $), and went back feeling that I don't understand...
item.content:encoded: It reminds me my trip. I watched, tasted a little bit of the gembling (lost 50 $), and went back feeling that I don’t understand…
